title: SWAROVSKI Crystalline Treasure Box
description: Store special mementos in this sparkling treasure box. Expertly crafted in polished silver-tone metal, with a fully-faceted crystal lid and over 6,000 crystals, it shimmers spectacularly. Makes an elegant gift for someone special or would be a statement piece for your own home.
